lenders.name: Hillary
lenders.loan_because: I've been to Cambodia and seen what the money will be going towards. I really believe that if we all help a little it will make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home to take care of my child.

lenders.name: João Pedro
lenders.loan_because: I aim for a world of equal opportunities.

lenders.name: Shin
lenders.loan_because: I'm sure that my loans help someone who produces something and moves the world forwards, definitely not backwards, although it's one small step. Thank you, Kiva and entrepreneurs. You give meanings to my money.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Manager at manufacturing plant.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: People helped me get started and now I can help others
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a computer system

lenders.name: Maggie

lenders.occupational_info: Learning and applying my knowledge to writing papers and various projects. Same pattern persists for many months.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: the returns are better when I invest in people than when I invest in the bank!

lenders.name: Michal

lenders.occupational_info: I earn money using tools which others gave me for free.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I am able

lenders.name: Emerson & Sarah

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a well respected site.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help people work through their legal problems.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe people can do many great things if given a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a graphic design and corporate merchandise company.  We also do web design.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: helping others is what we're all here for!

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It puts my life into perspective.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in fashion

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: If the world is not a better place for my having been here, I am just taking up space.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with infants and children to age three who have disabilities and are behind in doing things normal children their age can do. I teach their parents how to help them. I also work with elderly who are very ill and cannot take care of themselves. I help them gain strength and learn to do skills they lost when they became ill.

lenders.name: Carey
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make custom jewelry and soap party favors.

lenders.name: Claude
lenders.loan_because: We're a small planet and a big village, aren't we?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm taking care of my husband (91) and my mom (82) who's "hospitalized at home". I'm learning webdesign so I hope to be able to work as long as I can.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: a woman of dignity who is helping her husband wih the work of her hands is worthy of help
lenders.occupational_info: I was a para legal in a law firm for 25 years am  now retired and volunteer in the food panty, library and office of our church

lenders.name: G & S
lenders.loan_because: To honor the kind and generous spirit of my mother and father.
lenders.occupational_info: I have great respect for entrepreneurs willing to create a business and work hard for their livelihood.

lenders.name: Joanne and Doug
lenders.loan_because: We care.

lenders.name: Robert E
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an International Business and Religious Studies Major.  I am learning to love God and love others and then teach others how to do the same.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: A single act of kindness can change the world

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites.

lenders.name: suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others become self supportive and take care of their families.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: I feel a connection to people around the world who are struggling in their daily lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I find resources for people who are hospitalized.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I think it is Good.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to learn how to draw and write.  I want to be able to tell stories about what I believe.

lenders.name: Dill Pickle Designs,Inc.
lenders.loan_because: Just as I began my journey and dream of building my own company I saw a television special on Kiva.  I decided then and there that Kiva would be the organization our Company would support.  Building dreams and taking risks together across the globe unites our Company with  women and men making lives better for themselves and their families.  There is no higher honour than helping those who have greater struggles.
lenders.occupational_info: sleep masks and sleepwear

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: I was intorduced to it by a tv personality and was at first concerned about over the internet payment. I have since gotten over the concern and feel this is a way to help the local. If the person is sincere I hope that his dream is everything he hoped it would be. good luck and with love Nancy
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick people, all ages and with all kinds of problems.

lenders.name: Jena
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting people that are working hard to making their lives better.  And if I were born in the third world, I could be the person asking for the loan and not the lender.

lenders.name: deviantmonk
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others build better lives for themselves and their families and also because I want God's love to work through me.
lenders.occupational_info: I create art and videos on my computer.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I think every little bit makes a difference!

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is something I can do for someone far away. I have always wanted to help others. This is a great way to do so. I'm so happy to contribute to a greater good...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Neonatal Nurse. I work in a Hospital and take care of very small babies born too early. It is a very exciting job and I love what I do very much!

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans help small business owners.  The payback of loans is excellent.

lenders.name: Patrick McKeough
lenders.occupational_info: My company, The Successful Investor Inc.,  publishes information and opinions that help people decide how to invest their savings. We also manage investments for people who prefer to have us make the investment decisions for them.

lenders.name: Torey
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think it is really neat to help a specific person, rather than just giving to an organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in high school

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Help is needed
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to give back!

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I feel that all people have the right to be happy productive participants in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with special needs

lenders.name: Kosuke
lenders.loan_because: It gives people opportunities to help themselves.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: "There's only one rule that I know of: damnit, you've got to be kind." - Kurt Vonnegut
lenders.occupational_info: I train monkeys to be service animals for people with mobility disabilities (including spinal cord injuries, ALS, strokes, or severe arthritis). I am also an EMT for the city of Cambridge. In my free time, I compete in triathlons and get lost in the woods (often at the same time).

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I think we all have to do what we can, I always say "no one is getting out alive" but that doesn't mean we can't do some good while we are here.

lenders.name: Lauren Honey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have better lives.

lenders.name: Deepa
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I learn and make "connections":-)

lenders.name: evie
lenders.loan_because: a gift was given to me to help someone through Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: have raised 3 children,cook, clean, work in the yard, garden, volunteer work in the community and at my church

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturer of construction materials.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I respect anyone that wants to work to care for their family &/or better themselves. I've been blessed or I wouldn't have anything to lend. I'm thankful that my son and daughter-in-law introduced me to Kiva where a loan can be repaid and loaned to another, then another. Being able to see the actual person requesting a loan sticks with me and reminds me that Kiva is a better choice than buying an expensive dinner or things I don't need when these people requesting loans will do so much with so very little. I pray for and wish success to each entrepreneur!
lenders.occupational_info: I work a full time job and also own part of a small business.

lenders.name: Napoleon Methodist
lenders.loan_because: we believe it is part of our responsibility to do and to be God's work in the whole world.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start and run a business  even with help!  I want to help others become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell maternity clothes and breastfeeding supplies as well as baby gifts.

lenders.name: Mathew
lenders.loan_because: it makes a direct impact on people's lives.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I do not tell the woRld what I can do...I sHow it! sVn
lenders.occupational_info: Materials Science, Nanotechnology, Investments & Leisure Travel.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate this life to be able to do so much and have so much and I want to share with others around the world, to better lives for all
lenders.occupational_info: Homeopathy is natural health care

lenders.name: Carl, Karen & Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are willing to work to make their lives better.  My wife, young daughter and I traveled the oceans for twelve years on a small sail boat.  We met many wonderful people who owned the small shops, market stalls and cafes in the coastal towns we visited.  We have been fortunate in our lives and are thankful for the chance to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Both my wife and I are retired.  She was a teacher.  I programmed computers.  Now our daughter is the worker - a student starting 6th grade.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva.org by a good friend.  I wish to honor the faith placed in me by that person. I believe he felt that I would see the value Kiva.org provides to our fellow business people in developing areas.
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing consultant, I am hired by small to medium-sized businesses to suggest ways they can sell their products or services.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I have empathy for the difficulties of getting out of poverty. I believe that with the right motivation a little can go a long way.
Also, I believe good deeds generate more good deeds, and that the world in general can use more good vibes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired family physician. I am in the process of learning Spanish because I would like to go to Latin America somewhere and help and/or teach basic health care.

lenders.name: angela
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great initiative
lenders.occupational_info: I help people work better together

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: I like to give gifts that keep giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I explain how methods in urban planning can help prevent individuals from exposures to common, yet widespread toxic chemicals.  Most people have about 200 toxic exposures per day.

lenders.name: Duncan
lenders.loan_because: It helps people help themselves.

lenders.name: Suzie
lenders.loan_because: I was raised very poor and now have been very successful, I want to help people that are trying to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a plumbing company and service people with emergency plumbing problems.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: so little can make so much difference and helping a person learn to fish is better then trying to feed the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Easy, very little time involved and I love that I am making a difference.

lenders.name: Caelin
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes it's not about changing the world, it's just about making one person's life a little bit easier.

lenders.name: Miki
lenders.loan_because:
Everybody deserves the chance to have a better life and be happy.
I would like to connect with the people around the world.

lenders.name: Katherine and Nick
lenders.loan_because: We hope we are able to make a small yet significant contribution to making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Lesly
lenders.loan_because: This is a Mothers Day gift from my Son in law and Daughter. They are wonderful people and soon to be parents and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a travel consultant.

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: i want to help like people have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: i translate specialist written language into plain language that non-specialists can easily understand. Also, i analyze the way businesses do things to help them to work more efficiently.

lenders.name: Dami
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful about the possibilities I have as a German citizen. I want to give back something and help a little bit to make this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to learn new things such as to help other people to overcome horrible events like rape or a disaster. i also help teachers to work better with violent students and show them ways to improve their teachings.

lenders.name: stacy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in poverty to improve their own lives through building sustainable businesses.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I have read about the success micro-lending brings to people and wanted to help those in a more difficult situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending law school.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other people in need. I am into the ministry of helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been blessed beyond measure and feel the need to share the blessings with others.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle, and studies show those who give the most are those who are in the least position to do so. I believe it's part of my service to the world to help others any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information in books, magazines, in videos, and through the internet. I also teach people how to use databases and computers. I hope to help people in ways that will make a positive difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because:
When you really need money ,banks do not lend you even a small amount.
I am not a bank and perhaps lending a few dollars can make a great difference

lenders.name: May and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We loan in hopes to make a difference and give those less fortunate and opportunity to realise their dreams

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: if everyone does a little bit then together we can do a lot!

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others less fortunate have a way of surviving and improving their lives by way of small gifts from those who have to give.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: If people are in a position to do so, when thought deeply about, it seems to me as socially responsible and, to be honest, it really seems pretty selfish not to.  Through advertising we are encouraged to waste countless cash on unnecessary 'stuff' (mostly for ourselves and next a few close to us) when people need basics, Crazy. I wish the media would stop telling us that the normal way to live and find happiness is pursuing generally selfish wasteful consumption, instead of giving people a helping hand when you can.

lenders.name: kachis
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is a fantastic way of helping those places and people make the most of their talent and potential.I appreciate being able to participate in that.

lenders.name: Yoshitsugu
lenders.loan_because: Everybody is a friend

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are one world and credit should not be an statement of privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the non-profit world, trying to improve how organizations and create better ways to help those who in need.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.occupation: legal recuriter & owner of EMC SEARCH
lenders.loan_because: It is the way to win over the world.  This is a foreign policy that works.

lenders.name: Juanita

lenders.name: Canadian Tool and Supply

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: women of the world need empowerment.

lenders.loan_because: We have seen what these small loans can do to help people.  We first became aware of them while working in Dhaka, Bangladesh.  Our daughter introduced us to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: We were school teachers in various countries around the world:  Taiwan, Singapore, Indonesia, Czech Rep., Egypt, Bangladesh.

lenders.name: Tatsuo
lenders.loan_because: kiva offers me great opportunities to help people who needs help.
lenders.occupational_info: do research and education in a university.

lenders.name: Sherrill
lenders.loan_because: My daughter introduced me to KIVA- to help others.

lenders.name: Bob and Ann
lenders.loan_because: We have been fortunate to have good jobs and a steady income. It is time to share with others in need
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Internal Medicine department at the Naval Hospital Pensacola, Florida in the United States. Most of my patients are retired military and over the age of 50.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I like to pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people design and build surroundings in which they can enjoy their friends and family.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Each one reach one!
lenders.occupational_info: Care, Confidence and Connection through Horses.  We reach out to kids and connect with them through our horses.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and in elementary school.

lenders.name: Loralyn
lenders.loan_because: What might seem like a small amount of money to me can have a huge impact on someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in graduate school studying to be a microbiology professor and researcher.

lenders.name: Paquette Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women,  to make a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: I train employees in the company where I work, to perform their job responsibilities safely and efficiently.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can.  What feels like a small loan to me can make a large difference.  Bravo Kiva!  May all the entrepreneurs on this site continue to be courageous & prosperous.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife Lauren & I founded Wisdomology.com to help promote personal and planetary peace.  It's an amazing community of people all over the world who are sharing the wisdom of their lives.  I invite you to join us!

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: After traveling and meeting so many people working hard to survive, I realized it only took a little support and love to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist the employees of my company in improving their skills and talents in the workplace and as individuals.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the idea - and it helps put things in perspective when I get stressed about money.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It's a small but powerful way for me to positively change someone's world for good.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I love all people.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people in need of public assistance through government programs.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.occupation: Retired administrator with State of Ohio

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.occupational_info: I help take care of the costumes used onstage in the Broadway (New York City) musical The Lion King (as well as some other shows). In addition to doing repairs and such, I help the actors get into & out of the costumes during the show.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: My stepdaughter gave me the Monther's Day gift of being able to help other women financially.  I think this could be addictive!
lenders.occupational_info: I help families protect their lifestyes and their abillity to recieve quality care when they neeed help to just get through the day by designing an insurance policy to cover their future expenses for  care.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I have seen poverty in Africa first-hand and understand the need to develop an entrepreneurial spirit so that people can have pride & dignity in looking after their families. Life is very diffocult for women in Third World Countries, yet they continue to strive endlesly to improve life for themselves and their families. They deserve a helping hand from those who are more fortunate.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I received a wonderful Mother's Day gift from our son, Michael... a Kiva gift certificate!!!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate for mother's day 2008.  I love seeing the faces and reading the stories of the people that are working to make  better lives for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: I make loans to help other people out, and I find it rewarding. I also made one loan as a Mother's Day gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a computer to design structure for jets.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I was informed about the program through a Cultures class at my highschool, and I want to be that one chance that ever person in this world should get with a simple loan.

lenders.name: Pay It Forward
lenders.loan_because: we want to be of service to our global community and become personally involved in our world by financially assisting those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a school organization working with students who are interested in making a difference in the world and becoming civic-minded leaders.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone else to get started, the way I would like to have someone help me if I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but I do volunteer work.  I have always enjoyed working very much.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: This starts as a 40th birthday gift from my friends and family.  It is truly a gift that keeps on giving.  I want to BE the change that I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: "I wondered why somebody didn't do something.  Then I realized, I am somebody."
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a local Outreach that among many things,  assists people with rent, utilities, food, and clothing.

lenders.name: Jacob & Dana
lenders.loan_because: we know that the first few hundred dollars is always the hardest, but once you get started, nothing can stop you.
lenders.occupational_info: Jake is an attorney and project manager at a non-profit real estate development company in Camden, NJ. Dana is a public relations specialist working for a national PR firm based in Los Angeles

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the daily operations at a golf course. I also teach to help improve the ability of my clients.

lenders.name: Madge
lenders.loan_because: It's a good cause and they really help people with almost all money going to the people who need it and not to run the organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an artist who paints abstract paintings and a mixed media artist.

lenders.name: Svetlana & Daryl
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people live better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to the children of immigrants and Daryl is a computer developer.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: The gift just keeps on giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chicago-based consultant helping people to better market and/or sell their products and services.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to promote the concept of microfinance
lenders.occupational_info: I value companies.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: i got loan money as a mother's day gift.What a great idea to be able to"mother" some other folks in need of a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I  am a ceramics teacher.I teach kids from 3-18 and their moms handbuilding and potters wheel techniques.We all have a great time making a mess

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometime in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a shop that sells plants and flowers.

lenders.name: dr. martin
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is happiness!

lenders.name: _h_
lenders.occupational_info: thinking & writing & teaching

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.  I believe if we all are each others customers we will never go to war.  With that in mind I want to help people improve their lives through business ownership.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide people with the opportunity to improve their lives through business ownership.

lenders.name: Robert Harbin-McGee
lenders.loan_because: Giving is essential. Many people have helped me throughout my life. I think & believe we are all One - We are all in this together. No matter what our backgrounds, lifestyles, circumstances: Each one of us is just one strand in the fabric of humanity - We are all connected in this way - We all matter. When I assist another - it is my brother, or my sister . If my assistance is useful, wanted, needed, and effective - we all benefit.
lenders.occupational_info:
Due to medical reasons, I can no longer work - but that does not mean I can not remain useful, productive, and do what I can to assist others. My passions include Music; "The healing effects of music"; Horticulture and Environmentally Friendly and Conscientious Landscape Design.
Contributing in ways that empower others. Patient Advocacy - Registered Nursing

lenders.name: Nadine
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to become successful on their own terms.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell people in my community about local problems and solutions, and invite them to become involved in making it a better place for us all to live in by donating money or time.

lenders.name: Mary Ruth
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day in order to make a loan.  What a wonderful gift for Mother's day - to have a daughter whose heart reaches out to others.  My heart is blessed, and I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lenders.name: Entrepreneurial Mom
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to help others realize their dreams, support the creative business spirit and improve the lives of children
lenders.occupational_info: Every Mom knows what I do all day!

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people and I believe in micro-loans.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: ... because I can

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurism at its most grass-roots level.  I loan because my spare change can so deeply affect for the good the lives of others.  I loan because I care for those less fortunate than I.  I loan because, but for the grace of God, there go I.
lenders.occupational_info: Economic development at the municipal level;  Downtown and Industrial development;  Business attraction and Retention.  Starting a Business.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it's more satisfying than low interest rates.
lenders.occupational_info: A bit of everything ... Look for a better way to direct capital to support more efficient social investing.

lenders.name: Andy and Nicky
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs stuff
lenders.occupational_info: I repair machines in a huge steel factory and she cleans up after messy americans

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: As a former teacher in home economics my interest was always in sewing.  I started my own small business (costume design) on small business loans and now that I've retired I want to help others with their own small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I continue to sew and do alterations on the vintage clothing I am selling.  I am also starting a small sewing school for teens and young adults who want to learn to sew.

lenders.name: grüvr ticket scout
lenders.loan_because:
Spread the Culture of Peace and enable people helping people via directly - globally.

We are interested in funding people who craft musical instruments and helping to market them on the internet, please get in touch!
lenders.occupational_info:
Our website helps people find local small concerts - the music people make for each other --  right next door. 

We are the only site to offer 'name your price'  concert tickets ... so check it out - we're donating some of our profits  to kiva projects.

Music brings people together.

PEACE!

lenders.name: Mona
lenders.loan_because: it`s about justice and hope.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: family and education very important to me.
lenders.occupational_info: taking care of my family and home.

lenders.name: Kathrin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of microlending.

lenders.name: Letty
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me the money that I loned as a gift for mother's day last year.  I will continue to reloan her gift as long as Kiva exists.  Her gift to me will hopefully help someone manifest their dreams.  This is what giving is all about.  My daughter's gift to me has helped me manifest one of my dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Office work.  Not very exciting but it pays the bills.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: MicroLoans work when large aid programs don't.

lenders.name: Sipra
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other through life with love and sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people stretch their bodies and calm their minds so that they feel good, taking away aches and stresses from their daily being through Yoga. I help people to cook healthy and delicious foods. I also do Reiki, which is healing aches through gentle touch.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: My son, David, introduced me to KIVA and sent me a gift certificate for Mother's Day.  I've always loved helping people and this is a wonderful opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: For 34 years I've enjoyed  helping people sell their homes and find new homes.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has a purpose and can contribute something to the world.  I want to help them.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to make something of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young people at school every day!

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: My son gave me this gift of Kiva for Mother's Day and I look forward to helping someone who wants to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am presently volunteering with a local hospital and enjoy my work.

lenders.name: Alice & Mom
lenders.loan_because: My Mother's Day gift from son

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way that I feel that I can help the people that need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I feed people!

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I can...  If a Waiter can do this as a simple server, you can too.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: It is effective.  What more can be asked of small acts but that they be effective?

lenders.name: Belgian
lenders.loan_because: I realize how many opportunities we get thrown into our lap just because we were born in a rich country, that others have to work hard for.
lenders.occupational_info:
I keep a travel blog about Belgium,
with information about beer, museums, partying, nature, chocolate, fashion ...

lenders.name: Andrew Dergousoff
lenders.loan_because: I understand the dreams, struggles and sacrifices that come along with being an entrepreneur. Living in Canada has afforded me access to resources that might not be available to other entrepreneurs in developing countries. I would like to help people with big dreams to pursue their ambitions.
lenders.occupational_info: At International Conference Services, our passion is organizing superior conferences, events and incentive programs. It is our aim to Inspire, Create and Succeed alongside our clients while providing unique, world class experiences.

lenders.name: SunnyRaindrops
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do. God has blessed me so much and in so many ways and even though I'm not rich by American standards I am so excited to be able to help others out with their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a souvenir shop.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women helping women is a small way that I can help to empower and change a life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher's assistant, and I work in an elementary classroom with students that struggling with their learning.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to reverse gender inequality by empowering women through economic opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I study a lot! I'm also the co-founder of a group called University of Oregon Students for Global Health, which  strives to raise awareness of preventable diseases (mainly AIDS, malaria and tuberculosis) and raises funds for an organization called Partners in Health (PIH).

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to succeed in life.  I have economic students that help me collect pennies every semester to loan to Kiva entrepreneurs.  They like to be a part of making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students economics and sociology.

lenders.name: Carrie and Robert
lenders.loan_because:
This portfolio is kept in memory of  Carrie (1939 - 2008).  Carrie went through more than anyone should have to as a child, but always maintained a positive outlook and zeal for life - learning, traveling and helping others.   Her unrelenting spirit for life was an inspiration to all who knew her.    
Carrie wanted this portfolio to help women around the world who were taking care of their children and involved in agriculture or food production.  Being an orphan herself and a volunteer teaching art to children in orphanages, I know Carrie would also find a personal joy in assisting women who have taken in orphans.

lenders.name: Ardis
lenders.loan_because: My daughter made me aware of a wonderful way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but enjoying a full life as a wife, mother, grandmother and great-grandmother.

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: It is by far the most effective international aid mechanism.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate how pollutants move through groundwater and research methods for producing clean water.

lenders.name: Alise
lenders.loan_because: I care...
lenders.occupational_info: Be an individual under Gods' direction...to proclaim the gospel to all possible, in every way, everywhere...encouraging the who-so-evers to evaluate the spiritual aspect of their lives, and make sure they have been born again  {asking God the Father  in Jesus Christ name, to forgive you for all sin, invite Him into your heart and guide your life by His spirit...ensuring your eternal destiny.  I enjoy seeing others prosper and be in health also, therefore if I can help my fellowman in all ways possible...GREAT.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people working toward a goal and trying to improve things.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on projects that involve green technology and transportation.

lenders.name: Ransom Family
lenders.loan_because: we want to learn about and help people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Building computer technologies for small businesses.

lenders.name: Chris and Joe
lenders.loan_because: we understand the power of financing
lenders.occupational_info: we are students of medicine.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others continue to lift themselves up and really know in their hearts that what they need is on the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bookkeeper for 3 small businesses - a construction company, a chocolate company (yum!)  and a marketing group.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the phone and pass the caller on to the correct person

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve an opportunity to better ones life.

lenders.name: Rosemarie
lenders.loan_because: because we all should think of more than ourselves.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is more than providing money.  It's showing the folks who borrow that there are people who care about them and are rooting for them to succeed in business and in life.  This can be as uplifting and uniting as any aspect of the program.  Also, I think the program promotes social justice and access to a decent life and through this peace and understanding.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring amusement, laughter, warmth, and companionship to my human housemates.  This lifts their spirits, reduces their stress, boosts their immune system, and helps them keep their petty concerns in perspective.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
I want the poor to prosper.
I want a fairer world.
I want the world to live in community.
lenders.occupational_info: I make medicine out of herbs and use cups, needles, and oils to make people better.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It is a necessary part of expressing my gratitude for the good life I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family and help my local school district apply for funding through grant applications.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an aerospace engineer.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it gives me a connection to people around the world and encourages me to learn more about where they live. I think Kiva is a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I do web development and manage information technology services for a manufacturing company in st louis.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: caring for people

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I hope this will make the world a smaller place.  I exclusively loan to people manufacturing or selling liquor, or dealing with goats in some manner.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I am a small-business owner myself, and like to support others across the world doing the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have muscular injuries, and help them to get better.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am a mom and want other moms to be able to care for their children with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a school that helps college students learn how to become teachers for very young children.

lenders.name: Wilson
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all connected !!

lenders.name: suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Because the Lord loves a cheerful giver.  Because I have so much.  Because they have so little.  Because for what it costs to feed my cat I can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do administrative social work specializing in a feeding program for home day care settings.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: it's wonderful to be able to help people directly, even in this small way.  Today I joined and made three loans in honor of my mother, Thelma Carter, who died in 1997, and who cared so much about helping people throughout the world better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for  an organization that promotes international educational and cultural exchange.

lenders.name: SOPHIA
lenders.loan_because: there is no other choice

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help others less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturing company. I support network, hardware, and software issues within the company.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are trying to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers in a school of 1250 students.  I have taught English, careers, foods, nutrition, parenting, physical education, and health.
